src:
Neuničljivi Samsung Galaxy XCover Field Pro

01 Nov 2019, 13:33

V naslednjih nekaj tednih bomo pri nas in v drugih državah evropske unije lahko kupili nov pameti mobilni telefon podjetja Samsung, ki je pisan na kožo nerodnim in tistim, ki se veliko gibajo po terenu. Telefon Samsung Galaxy XCover Field Pro je namreč prilagojen uporabi v manj ugodnih oziroma prijaznih pogojih, saj lahko brez težav prenaša namakanje, umazanijo, prah, padce in udarce. Poleg tega pa je tudi dovolj zmogljiv za opravljanje vsakodnevnih nalog in poganjanje večpredstavnostnih vsebin, saj temelji na osnovi še vedno priljubljenega pametnega telefona Samsung Galaxy S9.
Robustni Samsung Galaxy XCover Field Pro je v primerjavi s predhodnikom nekoliko tanjši in elegantnejši, mogoče pa ga je uporabljati celo v navezi z zaščitnimi rokavicami. Tu so pričakovano na voljo tudi osnovne fizične tipke, kar olajša uporabo nekaterih funkcij predvsem, ko je uporabnik v gibanju. Samsungov robustni telefon se sicer ponaša s standardom IP68, kar v praksi pomeni, da se mu ne bo zgodilo nič hudega, če ga za pol ure potopite v 1,5 metra globoko vodo. Da je novost odporna na udarce, pa jamči vojaški standard MIL-STD 810G. Poskrbljeno je pa tudi za varnost podatkov, za kar je zadolžen varnostni sistem Samsung Knox, ki se je izkazal za nadvse zanesljivega.
Telefon Samsung Galaxy XCover Field Pro je opremljen z zanimivo strojno opremo, ki obsega 13-centimetrski oziroma 5,1-palčni zaslon z razmerjem stranic 16 proti 9 in ločljivostjo QHD (2.560 x 1.440 slikovnih točk), zmogljiv mobilni procesor Samsung Exynos 9810, štiri gigabajte sistemskega pomnilnika in vgrajeni pomnilnik s 64 gigabajti prostora za shranjevanje podatkov. Preostala oprema obsega še baterijo kapacitete 4.500 miliamper ur, digitalni fotoaparat ločljivosti 12 milijonov slikovnih točk, spletno kamero ločljivosti osem milijonov slikovnih točk in bralnik prstnih odtisov.
Pametni mobilni telefon Samsung Galaxy XCover Field Pro meri 158,5 x 80,7 x 14,2 milimetrov in tehta 256 gramov. Operacijski sistem je Android Oreo, ta pa bo kmalu nadgrajen na novejši in uporabnejši Android 10.



Povezave: Samsung
text:
Indestructible Samsung Galaxy XCover Field Pro

01 Nov 2019, 12:33

In the next few weeks, we will be able to buy from Samsung and other European Union countries a new smart Samsung mobile phone that is embarrassed to the skin and those who move a lot around the terrain. Samsung Galaxy XCover Field Pro is designed to be used in less favorable or friendly conditions, as it can easily tolerate soaking, dirt, dust, falls and shocks. In addition, it is powerful enough to perform day-to-day tasks and power multimedia content, based on the still popular Samsung Galaxy S9 smartphone.
The robust Samsung Galaxy XCover Field Pro is slightly thinner and sleeker than its predecessor, and can even be used in conjunction with protective gloves. Basic physical keys are also expected to be available here, making it easier to use some features especially when the user is on the move. Samsung's ruggedized phone boasts the IP68 standard, which means that, in practice, it won't hurt if you submerge it in 1.5 meters deep water for half an hour. The MIL-STD 810G military standard guarantees that the novelty is impact-resistant. Data security has also been taken care of, which is the responsibility of the Samsung Knox security system, which has proven to be extremely reliable.
The Samsung Galaxy XCover Field Pro is equipped with exciting hardware including a 13-inch or 5.1-inch screen with a 16 to 9 aspect ratio and QHD resolution (2,560 x 1,440 pixels), a powerful Samsung Exynos 9810 mobile processor, four gigabytes of system memory and built-in memory with 64 gigabytes of storage space. Other equipment includes a 4,500-milli-amp battery, a 12-megapixel digital camera, an eight-megapixel webcam and a fingerprint reader.
The Samsung Galaxy XCover Field Pro smartphone measures 158.5 x 80.7 x 14.2 millimeters and weighs 256 grams. The operating system is Android Oreo, which will soon be upgraded to the newer and more usable Android 10.



Links: Samsung
